q: Allen Iverson , who entered shooting 42.1 percent and averaging 30.5 points, shot 2-for-20 in the first three quarters and 5-of-28 overall along with 10-of-14 from the foul line. He also had four steals and committed four turnovers. It's a game that I want to forget, but it's a game I'll probably remember for the rest of my life because it was one of the worst games I've ever played, Allen Iverson said."
